linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Latest Ubuntu LTS or Latest Steam OS
  • Processor: Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 900 series or Radeon HD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest Ubuntu LTS or Latest Steam OS
  • Processor: Quad-Core Procesor and more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2050 series or Radeon RX
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Race Manager Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 900 series or Radeon HD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad-Core Procesor and more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2050 series or Radeon RX
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
